definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: commandment;—´[[מ]] Pr 6:23 +; cstr. [[מִחְוִת]] Jos 22:3 +; sf. [[מִחְוׇתְְֽ]] De 26:13, Ps 119:96; [[מִחְוׇתוֹ]] Nu 15:81; pl. [[מִחְוֹת]] abs. Le 26:14 +([[מִחְווֹת]] Ne 9:14); cstr. Ne 4:2 +; sf. [[מִחְוֹתַי]] Ge 26:5 +, etc.;—not used before D and Je; in Je only of man's commands; not Ez nor Minor Proph., exc. Mal;—

commandment, of man: king, 1Ki 2:43, 2Ki 18:36 = Is 36:21, 2Ch 8:15 + 14 t.; [[אב]] ´[[מ]] Je 35:14, Je 35:16, Je 35:18, Pr 6:20; [[אנשׁים]] ´[[מ]] Is 29:13; pl. only Je 35:18, Pr 10:8, Ne 10:33; [[המחוה]], the order (title of property) Je 32:11.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: pl. of commands of D and later codes c. 2 pl. (ye shall, shall not; Br:Hex. new ed., 246 ff.), Le 4:2 + 5 t. P, Is 48:18 + 25 t. (late; esp. Ps 119, 20 t.); ´[[שׁמר מ]] Ex 20:6 (R) Le 22:31 (H) De 4:2 + 10 t. D, 1Ki 14:8, 2Ki 18:6 + 5 t.; ´[[עשׂה מ]] Le 26:14 (H) + 5 t.; ´[[שׁמע מ]] De 11:13 + 4 t.; [[אשׁר חוּה]] ´[[המ]] Le 27:34 (H); ´[[עבר מ]] De 26:13, 2Ch 24:20; ´[[עזב מ]] 1Ki 18:18, 2Ki 17:16, Ezr 9:10; ´[[הפר מ]] Ezr 9:14; in combinations, esp. by Redactors and late writers; order various: (1) with [[חֻקִּים]] Ex 15:26 (R:D) De 4:40, Ezr 7:11 +; ´[[ח]] + [[משׁפטים]] De 26:17, 1Ki 8:58, Ne 1:7, Ne 10:30; + [[משׁפטים]], [[תורות]] Ne 9:18; + [[תורה]] Ne 9:14; + [[עדוֹת]] De 6:17, 1Ch 29:19, 2Ch 34:31. (2) with [[חֻקּוֹת]] Le 26:3 (H) De 6:2, De 10:13 + 9t.; ´[[ח]] + [[משׁפטים]] Le 26:15, De 8:11, De 11:1, De 30:16, 1Ki 6:12 + [[תורה]], [[משׁפטים]] Ps 89:32, + [[משׁפטים]], [[עֵדְוֹת]] 1Ki 2:3; + [[תּוֹרוֹת]] Ge 26:5 (R:D); +[[עדוֹת]] 2Ki 23:3. (3) with [[משׁפטים]] Nu 36:13 (P) 1Ch 28:7, Ne 9:29, Da 9:5; with [[תורות]] Ex 16:28 (R), with [[ערות]] Ne 9:34.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of special commands of God 1Sa 13:13, 1Ki 13:21, 2Ch 29:25, Ne 13:5, Mal 2:1, Mal 2:4, Job 23:12.
commandment, sg., of code of wisdom Pr 19:16, ‖[[תורה]] Pr 6:23, ‖[[דבר]] Pr 13:13; pl. of special commands Pr 2:1, Pr 3:1, Pr 4:4, Pr 7:1, Pr 7:2.
